alert.note: Alert for Alleghany; Craig (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 12:25AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Alleghany County, north central Craig County, south central Greenbrier and northeastern Monroe Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1224 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm just north of Pickaway,moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alleghany... Ronceverte... Union... Paint Bank... Jordan Mines... Pickaway... and Glace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
